Descartes of Borg's Basic LPC Tutorial

Note from angelbob: This tutorial wasn't written for DGD originally, and of course it's tremendously out of date. Don't expect it to be anything near perfect, but it should still introduce you adequately to the concepts behind LPC and an older version of the syntax. You can look at newer code samples such as the LPC Examples section of the top-level web page to figure out what's changed since this was written in 1993. Also please remember that this was written for a different driver, not DGD.
